公司名称: 北京莱博智环球科技有限公司
职位信息:
What You'll Do 
You will work with our software team to develop and deliver an unprecedented end-to-end localization automation solution that supports our cloud and on premises software products in up to multi languages spoken around the world. This is an ideal opportunity for someone with strong technical skills and is passionate about cultures and languages. Your responsibility will include: 
Establish operational and technical procedures, develop tools and integration solutions to automate and streamline internal workflow and processes
Perform day to day localization software engineering work for software user interface and documentation
Create and maintain high quality language packs in various languages for the collaboration products, both on premise and cloud based
Troubleshoot, resolve, and document localization issues and customer cases 
          Who you will work with
You've got experience creating automation tools and solutions for software and web-based applications. You will work with a group of professionals delivering culturally appropriate, high quality localized product software and documentations. You have an unique opportunity to join this highly empowered collaborative team.
  Who You are
You are a motivated self-starter who is highly results driven, love what you do, and strive to achieve engineering excellence and take initiative in your ongoing self-development. Inspire teamwork and collaboration.
   Our minimum requirements for this role:
  Bachelor's degree or Masters preferably in Computer Science or other related engineering discipline.
2 years of fully engaged Python software engineering, development, and testing, in a scrum or paired programming environments
2 years of experience in Java development, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Working experience with CI/CD systems Git, GitHub, Jenkins
Ability to learn and adapt to new, complex development environments with deep dive analytical skills and quantitative problem-solving ability
            Our desired requirements for this role:
Localization engineering experience preferred. Experience in enterprise applications
Working knowledge of cloud platforms (such as AWS) and SQL
Experience in Translation Memory Management Systems (XTM Cloud or WorldServer) or Computer Aided Translations tools (Passolo or Trados) 
Self-starter with demonstrated ability to learn quickly, take initiative, and be accountable for results and deadlines
Flexibility and creativity in planning and problem solving throughout the product life cycle, from high level conceptual design to detailed implementation and testing tasks
Able to communicate and collaborate effectively with team members of varied work styles
Understanding for diverse cultural, political and religious environments and be able to work successfully in those environments. Maintaining a sense of humor in stressful situations

职能类别：
软件工程师
关键字：
PythonJava

公司名称: 中软国际科技服务有限公司
职位信息:
SPEECH
背景介绍：
近些年来，随着移动互联网和移动终端设备的高速发展，语音识别也开始步入到我们的日常生活中，并逐渐为大众所了解，语音识别的发展也日新月异。语音技术正伴随着设备计算能力、网络技术等的发展，从实验室走入现实生活，从“超前”、不成熟变成越来越有价值的商业应用，这项技术使人类以最自然的方式与设备交互从而正在改变未来。在移动互联网，智能家居，可穿戴设备，车载设备等领域的广阔前景，使全球各大科技公司（微软、苹果、谷歌、三星、百度...）都在争相投入巨资进行研发。
中软语音团队与微软合作，在这个领域潜心耕耘了14年，我们的工程师正在与微软科学家一起为Cortana智能语音助手、Skype Translator等产品共同努力。热忱期待有专业的语音识别或自然语言处理背景的专家，同时也欢迎有坚实的计算机科学基础，对于新技术有强烈渴望、有创新精神、致力于语音技术发展的优秀人才加入我们。
项目名称 Speech （认真严谨）语音识别开发

2、产品模型识别缺陷修复
涉及的工具开发，40%开发量

1）必须具备 Python
